title: When will Spring Split NA LCS Icons be in store for purchase?
body: I'm ready to rep my favorite teams and supporting them by buying their icons! I am really curious though as to when they will be released with fantasy now out and the games starting at the end of this week.

replies.body:
Hey there! These are live in the store now.  A few teams who qualified late or updated their brands after this patch will be available during 7.2 (so the NA LCS bundle will also be available in 7.2 when all icons are in).  Enjoy!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Gonna guess during the next patch, if it's anything like the last 2 splits.
